tool_description: Get Your Unique ID and start using the API to access satellite and weather data.

api_list.name: Remove Report Language
api_list.description: This API endpoint allows you to remove the language setting for the report.

api_list.name: Update Field Info
api_list.description: Use this API to update information related to a specific field.

api_list.name: Delete Field
api_list.description: This API allows you to delete a specific field from your records.

api_list.name: Update Crop Code Of A Field
api_list.description: Use this API to update the crop code for a specific field to resume monitoring.

api_list.name: Get My Usage
api_list.description: This API retrieves the entire usage history of your API account.

api_list.name: Resume Field Monitoring
api_list.description: Use this API to resume monitoring for a specific field.

api_list.name: Get Sensed Days
api_list.description: This API retrieves the days on which satellite data is available for your fields.

api_list.name: Get SAR Days
api_list.description: Use this API to get the Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) days for your fields.

api_list.name: Retrieve Forecast Weather Data
api_list.description: This API retrieves weather forecast data for your specified fields.

api_list.name: Retrieve A Radar Vegetation Field Image
api_list.description: Use this API to retrieve an image of the radar vegetation field.

api_list.name: Retrieve All Farmers Data
api_list.description: This API retrieves data for all farmers and their respective farms.

api_list.name: Define Language of the HTML Field Report
api_list.description: Use this API to define the language of the field report generated.

api_list.name: Retrieve Crop Solution Database
api_list.description: This API retrieves solutions for major crop issues from a government-approved database.

api_list.name: Retrieve A Field Report
api_list.description: Use this API to retrieve a detailed report for a specific field.

api_list.name: Retrieve A Field Image
api_list.description: This API retrieves an image of a specific field.

api_list.name: Retrieve A Field Image Linegraph
api_list.description: Use this API to retrieve a line graph representation of a field image.

api_list.name: Retrieve A Field Area Index Image
api_list.description: This API retrieves an image of the field area index.

api_list.name: Retrieve Weather Forecast Data from Latitude and Longitude
api_list.description: Use this API to get weather forecast data based on latitude and longitude.

api_list.name: Retrieve Historical Weather for A Field
api_list.description: This API retrieves historical weather data for a specified field.

api_list.name: Retrieve Present Weather Data
api_list.description: Use this API to retrieve the current weather data for your fields.

api_list.name: Retrieve A Past Weather Graph
api_list.description: This API retrieves a weather graph for a specified past day.

api_list.name: Request Historical Satellite Data
api_list.description: Use this API to request historical satellite data for a specific field.

api_list.name: Retrieve Yield Estimates of a Field
api_list.description: This API retrieves yield estimates for a specified field.

api_list.name: Pause Field Monitoring
api_list.description: Use this API to pause the monitoring of a specific field.

api_list.name: Get Field Area By Boundary Points
api_list.description: This API retrieves the area of a field based on specified boundary points.

api_list.name: Modify Field Coordinates of Already Submitted Field
api_list.description: Use this API to modify the coordinates of an already submitted field.

api_list.name: Submit New Farm/Plot
api_list.description: This API allows you to submit a new farm or plot for monitoring.

api_list.name: Get Single Farm Data
api_list.description: Use this API to retrieve information about a single farm or farmer.
